long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing FontViz, the game-changing extension that revolutionises font validation for web designers, developers, and QA professionals. Say goodbye to the tedious and time-consuming process of manual font inspections – FontViz empowers you to streamline your web typography workflows like never before.

With FontViz, you can effortlessly inspect and validate every aspect of the fonts used on any website or web application. From font sizes and families to HTML tags and rendering consistency, this powerful tool equips you with a comprehensive suite of features to ensure pixel-perfect typography across your web projects.

Key Features:

One-Click Font Inspection:
Instantly identify and inspect all font sizes, families, and HTML tags used on a web page with a single click. No more squinting at tiny text or endlessly toggling between windows – FontViz consolidates all the information you need in a user-friendly interface.

Intelligent Text Highlighting:
Easily distinguish text elements that adhere to specific font settings by highlighting them directly on the web page. This feature enables you to quickly spot inconsistencies and ensure compliance with design specifications, saving you valuable time and effort.

Side-by-Side Font Comparison:
Compare font styles, weights, and sizes side-by-side to identify any discrepancies or inconsistencies with unparalleled ease. FontViz's visual comparison tools empower you to make informed decisions and maintain consistent typography across your projects.

Font Metrics Analysis:
Gain detailed insights into font metrics, including character widths, line heights, and kerning values. Fine-tune your typography for optimal readability and aesthetics, ensuring a polished and professional user experience.

SEO-Friendly HTML Tag Analysis:
Optimize your web content for search engines and accessibility by leveraging FontViz's HTML tag analysis feature. Segregate textual content based on HTML tags to validate the proper usage of headings and text elements, streamlining the process of identifying and addressing tag implementation issues.

Whether you're a web designer perfecting your typography, a developer ensuring consistent font rendering, or a QA professional meticulously validating font implementation, FontViz is your ultimate companion. Embrace effortless font validation and unlock a new level of efficiency, precision, and collaboration in your web projects.

Don't settle for anything less than pixel-perfect typography. Get FontViz today and elevate your web design and quality assurance processes to new heights!
